title: Reuters reveals Indian car makers propose tax cut on imports in trade deal with Britain
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:

The post Reuters reveals Indian car makers propose tax cut on imports in trade deal with Britain appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported Indian car makers have proposed cutting the tax rate on imported cars to 30% as part of a trade deal with Britain, an unprecedented move that could ease access to one of the world’s most protected automobile markets.Â 

The post Reuters reveals Indian car makers propose tax cut on imports in trade deal with Britain appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
